Title: 48 Hours
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Luke Del Tredici, Lesley Arfin (executive story editor), Gil Ozeri (executive story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake stupidly arrests a male suspect despite having no evidence and only has 48 hours to prove he did it or release him without charge.
